author: Marty Johnson
title: Hogan freezes budget, hiring in MD state government
description: Maryland Gov. Larry Hogan (R) on Friday said that the state was implementing a hiring and budget freeze, as severe revenue shortfall is expected because of the COVID-19 outbreak."The spread of this deadly virus is...
content:
Maryland Gov. Larry Hogan (R) on Friday said that the state was implementing a hiring and budget freeze, as severe revenue shortfall is expected because of the COVID-19 outbreak.
The spread of this deadly virus is wreaking havoc on our national and state eco… [+968 chars]
